name: LearnRealEstateInvesting
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
A detailed discussion of what's working NOW, in real estate investing. Charles Blair "The Mad Scientist" is a full time investor with over 30+ years experience, and currently runs the second largest real estate investing meetup in the nation, Real Deal Meetup. 

In these flash briefings, "The Mad Scientist" will cover topics including, marketing, wholesaling, rehabbing, buy n hold investing, and owner structured financing to name a few. 

Charles believes you should not be a one trick pone, but instead be a Transnational Engineer, and remember every Real Deal Flash Briefing will be 100% All Content, No Fluff, No BS, and No Gurus allowed.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
